data.message:
This is the time to really know true fans of Eminem. The thought fan listen to His lyrics religiously. And all I can see every since slot of up listen to walk on water is that you guys have no pity for Eminem at all. I don't know how much of you guys can handle that amount of expectations and yet mange to give us lyrics of such. My own fan as with Eminem is way beyond the melody, the lyrics are all I desire and am sure slot of you guys will be doing the same. 

I really pity Eminem cos he has done so much with rap such that alot of guys out there forgot he a man like Us. 
Guys I want you to remember that Eminem do use toilet just like us too. 
Let's criticise less and show more love to the the real Man. 
Thank you.

replies.message: Got goosebumps when he spitted the first lines.
Doubtful, I bet he sits down on the toilet to piss like a little bitch.
